Package controller

Class Event

java.lang.Object
controller.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Threadable, Serializable, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bell, FansOff, FansOn, LightsOff, LightsOn, PowerOut, Terminate, ThermostatDay, ThermostatNight, WaterOff, WaterOn, WindowMalfunction
public abstract class Event extends Object implements Serializable, Threadable
Event Class - Abstract class for events
